name: Global Fractal Signature Axiom
intent: Define the Global Fractal Signature as the set of scale-invariant semantic laws on the SFO.
constraints: A semantic law is a natural transformation L: F \-\> F on the SFO functor F: Scale \-\> SemSys.
L must satisfy scale-compatibility: L\_{n+1} ∘ σ\_{n-\>n+1} \= σ\_{n-\>n+1} ∘ L\_n.
The Global Fractal Signature G(F) is the set (or category) of all such L modulo semantic equivalence.
Under strong self-similarity, G(F) is determined by the SFO core Lim(F).
